CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Research relative to Luminara Academy?
SRP.A: Echo Research is {below} Luminara Academy in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Academy relative to Oracle Labs?
SRP.A: Luminara Academy is {above} Oracle Labs in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Labs relative to Echo Research?
SRP.A: Oracle Labs is {above} Echo Research in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total engineering graduates?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Research}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total engineering graduates?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Oracle Labs}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Oracle Labs's maximum Engineering Graduates in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Oracle Labs's maximum Engineering Graduates is in {1982}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Research's minimum Engineering Graduates in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Research's minimum Engineering Graduates is in {1968}.

NC.Q: Was the total Engineering Graduates in 1977 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total engineering graduates in 1977 was {lower} than in 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1969 and 1983, was the average total Engineering Graduates higher or lower than between 1977 and 1979?
NC.A: The average total engineering graduates between 1969 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1977 and 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1986, did the total Engineering Graduates experience a larger or smaller change than between 1976 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total engineering graduates between 1985 and 1986 was {smaller} than between 1976 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1983, did the total Engineering Graduates experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1979?
NC.A: The change in total engineering graduates between 1970 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1978 and 1979.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Echo Research} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Luminara Academy and Oracle Labs first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Luminara Academy and Oracle Labs first exchanged leading positions in {1969}.
